patterns: What is EG SARAL?
Tell me about the EG SARAL initiative
What is the journey of EG SARAL at IIT Jammu?
responses: In July 2018, IIT Jammu embarked upon an ambitious journey to simplify its Academic, Research, and Administrative processes. The goal was to build an integrated e-Governance Solution (EGS) to cater to various processes and workflows with a vision of creating an almost paperless office.

patterns: What is the message of EG SARAL?
Tell me the message behind EG SARAL
responses: EG effortlessly established accountability for service delivery and functional elegance in the very roots of the campus activities.

patterns: Who is the Associate Dean for EG SARAL?
Tell me about the Associate Dean of EG SARAL
responses: The Associate Dean for EG SARAL at IIT Jammu is Ankit Kathuria.

patterns: What portals are integrated with EG SARAL?
Which portals are part of the EG SARAL system?
responses: The portals integrated with EG SARAL include: PhD Admission portal, PG Admission portal, Vendor Registration portal, Donations portal, Saptarshi (Central Instrumentation Facility), and Intern Registration Portal.

patterns: What services are available in EG SARAL?
Tell me about the EG SARAL services
responses: The services provided by EG SARAL include EG SARAL AI CoE Portal for MoE, Flight Manifest Search Portal for CISF, Intranet Recruitment Portals, LGSDF 2021, and NEP 2020 Documents.

patterns: How can I contact for EG SARAL system queries?
Tell me the contact for EG SARAL system-related queries
responses: For queries related to the EG SARAL system, you can contact: saral@iitjammu.ac.in.

patterns: How can I contact regarding EG SARAL interface issues?
Tell me the contact for EG SARAL interface-related matters
responses: For EG SARAL interface-related matters, you can contact: saral@iitjammu.ac.in (Level 1).

patterns: How can I contact for unresolved EG SARAL issues?
Tell me the contact for unresolved EG SARAL system problems
responses: For unresolved issues, you can contact: ad.egs@iitjammu.ac.in (Level 2).

patterns: How can I contact for office-specific EG SARAL matters?
Tell me the contact for EG SARAL office-specific issues
responses: For office-specific matters, please contact the respective offices.

patterns: How is the security of EG SARAL maintained?
Tell me about EG SARAL's security and privacy practices
responses: We follow industry best practices for the security of the EG SARAL application. A third-party service provider, impaneled with CERT-IN, conducted a security audit. The personal data captured in individual profiles is never shared externally, and privacy of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) is maintained.

patterns: Tell me about Ankit Kathuria
Who is Ankit Kathuria in the EG SARAL team?
responses: Ankit Kathuria is the Associate Dean of EG SARAL at IIT Jammu and plays a vital role in the development and implementation of the EG SARAL e-Governance Solution.

patterns: How can I get support for EG SARAL?
Tell me about the EG SARAL support team
responses: While we have successfully implemented our system, we are supporting other higher education institutes in their journey of e-Governance by assisting with concept development, RFP preparation, deployment discussions, and sharing institutional memory on e-Governance.

patterns: What is the website for EG SARAL?
Tell me the EG SARAL website
responses: The website for EG SARAL at IIT Jammu is: [https://saral.iitjammu.ac.in/](https://saral.iitjammu.ac.in/).
